Name: iB Cricket Companion
About the game: With the iB Cricket Companion app, those playing iB Cricket in standalone Quest2/Quest headsets can access local PvP right from their desktop. You can bowl to your friend from this companion app and your friend can bat in VR in iB Cricket. Also, you can checkout the live matches and have fun. Bowl to your friends Choose the stadium, pitch, country jersey, day/night/overcast conditions, bowling level etc. right from your desktop and start the PvP match. Select the fieldset, pick special balls, and set the line & length to bowl. Have fun challenging your friends. iBTV Check out live matches and have fun watching them.
